00051 SceneModelView::SceneModelView(QWidget *parent)
00052     : QTreeView(parent)
00053 {
00054     setAcceptDrops(true);
00055 }
00056 
00057 void SceneModelView::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
00058 {
00059         
00060     if (event->button() == Qt::LeftButton){
00061         startPos = event->pos();
00062     }
00063     else if( event->button() == Qt::RightButton)
00064     {
00065         emit showMenu( indexAt( event->pos() ) );       
00066     }
00067     QTreeView::mousePressEvent(event);
00068 }
00069 
00070 void SceneModelView::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
00071 {
00072         Trace trace( "SceneModelView::mouseMoveEvent", false );
00073     if (event->buttons() & Qt::LeftButton) {
00074         int distance = (event->pos() - startPos).manhattanLength();
00075         if (distance >= QApplication::startDragDistance())
00076             startDrag(event);
00077     }
00078    // QTreeView::mouseMoveEvent(event);
00079 }
00080 
00081 void SceneModelView::dragEnterEvent(QDragEnterEvent *event)
00082 {
00083         Trace trace( "SceneModelView::dragEnterEvent", false );
00084         event->setDropAction(Qt::MoveAction);
00085         event->accept();
00086 }
00087 
00088 void SceneModelView::dragMoveEvent(QDragMoveEvent *event)
00089 {
00090         Trace trace( "SceneModelView::dragMoveEvent", false );
00091         event->setDropAction(Qt::MoveAction);
00092         event->accept();
00093 }
00094 
00095 void SceneModelView::dropEvent(QDropEvent *event)
00096 {
00097         Trace trace( "SceneModelView::dropEvent", false );
00098         
00099         QModelIndex newParent= indexAt(event->pos());
00100     if ( newParent.isValid() )
00101     {
00102         SceneModel* modelScene = static_cast< SceneModel* >(model());
00103                 QString type = modelScene->NodeFromIndex( newParent )->GetNode()->getTypeId().getName().getString();
00104                 
00105                 SoNode* parentNode = modelScene->NodeFromIndex( newParent )->GetNode();
00106                 if (! parentNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) return;
00107         
00108                 QByteArray data = event->mimeData()->data("text/objetID");
00109                 QDataStream stream(&data, QIODevice::ReadOnly);
00110                 QPoint position;
00111                 stream >> position;
00112                         
00113                 QModelIndex nodeIndex = indexAt( position );
00114                 
00115                 if ( modelScene->parent( nodeIndex ) == newParent ) return;
00116                 
00117                 SoNode* childNode = modelScene->NodeFromIndex( nodeIndex )->GetNode();
00118                 
00119                         
00120                 if ( ( parentNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) && 
00121                          !( childNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) )  return;
00122                          
00123                 if ( ( parentNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TShapeKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) && 
00124                          ( childNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) )  return;
00125                          
00126                 if ( ( parentNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TShapeKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) &&
00127                          !( childNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) ) 
00128                 {
00129                         
00130                         TShapeKit* shapeKit = static_cast< TShapeKit* > ( parentNode );
00131                         if( shapeKit->getPart("shape", false) ) return;
00132                 }
00133                         
00134                 QModelIndex ancestor = newParent;
00135                 while(ancestor.parent().isValid())
00136                 {
00137                         if(ancestor.parent() == nodeIndex)
00138                                 return;
00139                         else
00140                                 ancestor = ancestor.parent();   
00141                 }
00142                         
00143                 if ( nodeIndex != newParent )
00144                 {
00145                         if (event->keyboardModifiers () == Qt::ControlModifier)
00146                         emit dragAndDropCopy(newParent, nodeIndex);
00147                         
00148                 else
00149                         emit dragAndDrop(newParent, nodeIndex);
00150                 
00151                         event->acceptProposedAction();
00152                         event->accept();
00153         }
00154     }
00155 
00156 }
00157 
00158 void SceneModelView::startDrag(QMouseEvent *event)
00159 {
00160         Trace trace( "SceneModelView::startDrag", false );
00161         
00162         QPoint position = event->pos();
00163         QModelIndex index = indexAt(position);
00164         
00165         if( index.parent() == rootIndex() ) return;
00166         
00167         QByteArray itemPos;
00168         QDataStream stream (&itemPos, QIODevice::WriteOnly);
00169         stream << position;
00170                 
00171         QMimeData* mimeData = new QMimeData;
00172         mimeData->setData("text/objetID", itemPos);
00173           
00174         QDrag* drag = new QDrag(this);
00175         drag->setMimeData(mimeData);
00176         drag->start(Qt::MoveAction);
00177 
00178 }
